participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, often feeling a sense of loss and loneliness.
participant_1.background: i'm overweight and unhappy. my wife left me and took my children. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Friendly and optimistic, she finds joy in simple pleasures and values family.
participant_2.background: i love dogs. i live in alabama. i have three sisters. i like tacos.
